IX.iii.1.G.3.o
.
Documentation of In-Home Attendant Fees
If the fees for an in-home attendant require verification as described by
M21-1 Part IX, Subpart iii.1.G.3.n
, receipts or other documentation are required.
Documentation includes
a receipt bill
statement on the providerâ€™s letterhead
computer summary
an
Internal Revenue Service Form W-2, Wage and Tax Statement
ledger, or
bank statement.
The evidence submitted must include the
amount paid
date payment was made
purpose of the payment (the nature of the product or service provided)
name of the person to or for whom the product or service was provided, and
identification of the provider to whom payment was made.
